work.title: frontend developer
duties: Work alongside other software engineers to contribute HTML, CSS, and JS code to an existing codebase by creating and maintaining web applications.
Use SQL to make sensitive updates to code and files stored in an AWS bucket.
Work off a Jira Kanban board in an agile work methodology through sprint cycles.
Use the data visualization library D3JS to showcase beautiful and informative visuals to clients.
Communicate with the designers who specialize in designing dynamic web content to help them better understand the dynamic data we handle and how to best represent them.

Create internal tools for the Creative team such as a metrics dashboard to help the team leaders better see the metrics for designers using data from Google Sheets and using Google Apps Script to host the application.
Contribute to new products such as Websites by helping designers better understand the fundamentals of CSS class names and HTML structuring.

work.title: Learing Web Development
duties: Learned the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Expanded my knowledge by learning about frontend frameworks and backend web technologies such as Node.js
Built projects that tested my abilities as a developer.
Technically still ongoing as being a developer means always learning new techniques and technologies.
